name: Gezlar
content: Gezlar was a Chagrian male guard who worked for the Spice Runners of Kijimi. Gezlar was present at the Kijimi summit, where lead Spice Runner Zeva Bliss gathered numerous criminals in order to execute them. Poe Dameron, a recent member of the gang, and his droid EV-6B6, attempted to stop Bliss, rescuing the criminals. Gezlar noticed Dameron's actions and destroyed EV-6B6, taunting Dameron with the intent to kill him. However, Gezlar became distracted when Bliss fatally wounded New Republic Security Bureau officer Sela Trune, and Dameron used his blaster to shoot the guard in the head.
